text: Anyone else in Pune having high fever and terrible joint pain since 2-3 days? My neighbor also down with same thing. Is dengue spreading here?
Yes! I stay in Wakad, Pune. Fever, headache and rashes on hand. Doctor asked me to do dengue test.
User reports persistent high fever, retro-orbital pain, and joint pain for 3 days. These are classic symptoms of dengue. Please get NS1 antigen test immediately and stay hydrated.
Many people in my locality in Kolkata have stomach infection and loose motions. Is water contamination the reason?
Symptoms like diarrhea, vomiting and dehydration indicate possible water-borne disease like typhoid or gastroenteritis. Drink boiled water only.
Continuous cough for 2 weeks and mild fever. I feel weak. Anyone had TB symptoms like this in Chennai?
Chronic cough for more than 2 weeks with fever and weight loss could indicate tuberculosis. Please visit nearest TB center for sputum test.
High fever and chills since yesterday in Lucknow. Mosquitoes are too much these days. Malaria cases rising?
Fever with chills and sweating pattern is typical of malaria. Please get blood smear test done.
My eyes and skin turning yellow. Feeling tired. Anyone else in Ahmedabad facing jaundice?
Yellowing of eyes and fatigue are key symptoms of jaundice. Avoid oily food and get liver function test done.
Many people in office down with cold, cough, body ache. Swine flu again in Delhi?
Symptoms of H1N1 include fever, cough, sore throat, and body ache. Avoid crowded places and wear mask.
Sudden fever with joint swelling and rashes. Chikungunya cases in Hyderabad?
Joint swelling with fever and rashes is indicative of chikungunya. Take rest and fluids.
